idea-plugin.name: Unicode Escaper
idea-plugin.description:
Transform non ASCII subset of Unicode characters to escaped UTF-16 and vice versa.
Note: While this form is equivalent to code point references for the Basic Multilingual Plane
(0000â€”FFFF), a two-stage decoding process is needed to handle surrogates to access higher planes.

action.text: Convert from Characters to Unicode Escapes
action.description: Escape characters that not in the ASCII subset of Unicode (U+0000 through U+007F) in selected text

action.text: Convert from Unicode Escapes to Characters
action.description: Unescape unicode code points found in selected text
